short_summary: Request to supply services from 15 Senior Data Entry Clerks
description: Health Canada has a requirement for the services of 15 Senior Data Entry Clerks
full_summary:
**Temporary Help Services (THS) Requirement - Office Support**
=============================================================

### **Tender Details**

*   **Reference Number**: cb-9394-75762768
*   **Solicitation Number**: 1000253737
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-22
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-03T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-10-28
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

### **Description**

Health Canada seeks the services of 15 Senior Data Entry Clerks for Temporary Help for the Health Products Surveillance and Epidemiology Bureau (HPSEB) in the Marketed Health Products Directorate (MHPD) in the Health Products and Food Branch (HPFB).

### **Security Clearance**

The required security clearance is reliability.

### **Contract Duration**

The proposed contract duration is from October 28, 2023, to March 31, 2024.

### **Estimated Labor Hours**

The estimated level of effort for each resource is 825 hours.

### **Contact Information**

*   **Name**: Shallee Doll
*   **Email**: shallee.doll@clickhc-sc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (000) 000-0000

### **Attachments**

The tender notice and attachment can be found [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9394/npp.pdf)

### **Notice Type**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement.

### **Procurement Method**

The procurement method is Competitive - Selective Tendering.

### **Trade Agreements**

Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### **Regions of Opportunity**

National Capital Region (NCR)

### **Contact**

To receive further information or clarification, please contact Shallee
